title: Narrative Dojo
description: A React/FastAPI app that implements DALL-E 2 API for creation of custom storybooks with user-friendly interface. Utilizes SQL to create database tables and implemented a robust data storage system.
technologies: React | FastAPI | Bootstrap | Python | Javascript | PostgreSQL

title: CarCar
technologies: React | Django | Bootstrap | Python | Javascript | PostgreSQL
description: An all-encompassing single-page automobile dealership management application that prioritizes user experience and functionality.

title: Team
description: Team Dashboard is a Node command-line application that takes in information about employees to generate a dynamic HTML web page.
